cyclone.name: CRISTOBAL
cyclone.current_location: about 50 mi WSW of Campeche, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to meander in the southern Bay of Campeche through mid-week, then gradually lift northward toward the central Gulf of Mexico late in the 5-day period.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern Bay of Campeche coast of Mexico (near Campeche–Puerto de Veracruz)

weather_observation.watch_coast: None along U.S. coast – current Tropical Storm Warning is for Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz, Mexico
weather_observation.warning_coast: Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz, Mexico
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southern Bay of Campeche coast of Mexico
